tests.test: magic-moves > arrange > arrange([ ♠, ♣, ♥, ♦, ✨ ], 3, 0): it moves the ♦ (index 3) to the front (index 0)
tests.name: it moves the ♦ (index 3) to the front (index 0)

tests.test: magic-moves > arrange > arrange([ ♠, ♣, ♥, ♦, ✨ ], 3, 0): it does not mutate the input
tests.name: it does not mutate the input

tests.test: magic-moves > arrange > arrange([ ♠, ♣, ♥, ♦, ✨ ], -1, 0): moves the ✨ (size - 1) to the front (index 0)
tests.name: moves the ✨ (size - 1) to the front (index 0)

tests.test: magic-moves > arrange > arrange([ ♠, ♣, ♥, ♦, ✨ ], 1, -2): moves the ♣ (index 1) just before the back (size - 2)
tests.name: moves the ♣ (index 1) just before the back (size - 2)

tests.test: magic-moves > arrange > arrange([ ♠, ♣, ♥, ♦, ✨ ], -3, -4): moves the ♥ (size - 3) one to the left (size - 4)
tests.name: moves the ♥ (size - 3) one to the left (size - 4)

tests.test: magic-moves > arrange > arrange([ ♠, ♣, ♥, ♦, ✨ ], 0, 0): keeps ♠ (index 0) in place
tests.name: keeps ♠ (index 0) in place

tests.test: magic-moves > rearrange > rearrange([ ♠, ♣, ♥, ♦, ✨ ], 3, 0): it moves the ♦ (index 3) to the front (index 0)
tests.name: it moves the ♦ (index 3) to the front (index 0)

tests.test: magic-moves > rearrange > rearrange([ ♠, ♣, ♥, ♦, ✨ ], 3, 0): it mutates the input
tests.name: it mutates the input

tests.test: magic-moves > rearrange > rearrange([ ♠, ♣, ♥, ♦, ✨ ], -1, 0): moves the ✨ (size - 1) to the front (index 0)
tests.name: moves the ✨ (size - 1) to the front (index 0)

tests.test: magic-moves > rearrange > rearrange([ ♠, ♣, ♥, ♦, ✨ ], 1, -2): moves the ♣ (index 1) just before the back (size - 2)
tests.name: moves the ♣ (index 1) just before the back (size - 2)

tests.test: magic-moves > rearrange > rearrange([ ♠, ♣, ♥, ♦, ✨ ], -3, -4): moves the ♥ (size - 3) one to the left (size - 4)
tests.name: moves the ♥ (size - 3) one to the left (size - 4)

tests.test: magic-moves > rearrange > rearrange([ ♠, ♣, ♥, ♦, ✨ ], 0, 0): keeps ♠ (index 0) in place
tests.name: keeps ♠ (index 0) in place
